Title: Relates to special act school districts, special education and the protection of people with special needs
Summary: Relates to special act school districts, special education and the protection of people with special needs; authorizes boards of education of special act school districts to establish fiscal stabilization reserve funds.
LawCode: Amd §§4004 & 4405, add §4008, Ed L; amd §494, Soc Serv L; add §§563 & 564, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to special act school districts and special education; and to amend the social services law and the executive law, in relation to the protection of people with special needs
